name: Luminate Wales - Margam Country Park

location.address: Margam Country Park, Port Talbot SA13 2TJ

pricing.notes: Tickets must be pre-booked online. Limited availability per timeslot.

description: Luminate transforms the historic grounds and castle of Margam Country Park into a breathtaking illuminated winter wonderland. This enchanting mile-long trail, created by world-leading lighting designers, guides visitors through stunning new installations and music-synchronized displays set against the spectacular backdrop of Margam's ancient parkland. Having welcomed over one million visitors nationwide, Luminate offers a truly immersive festive experience with interactive lighting moments, a magical Rainbow Path, enchanting Light Rose Gardens, and the magnificent Light Manor display. Each step reveals new wonders—from Winter Fairies dancing through the trees to colourful views across the historic landscape. Friendly stewards guide you along the route, making this a perfect winter evening for the whole family.
highlights: Rainbow Path and Light Rose Garden

heroImage.alt: Colourful illuminated light trail at Margam Country Park

accessibility.notes: Trail is suitable for wheelchairs and pushchairs
